title: The Original Kings of Comedy
cast: Steve Harvey, D.L. Hughley, Cedric The Entertainer, Bernie Mac
summary: A concert film featuring four major African American stand up comedians.

title: Outstanding: A Comedy Revolution
cast: Judy Gold, Guy Branum, Rosie O'Donnell, Fortune Feimster, Robin Tyler
summary: A feature length documentary that explores the history of LGBTQ+ stand up comedy, considering its importance as an instrument for social change over the past five decades.

title: Comedy Queen
cast: Sigrid Johnson, Oscar TÃ¶ringe, Frida Beckman, Ellen Taure, Iggy Malmborg
summary: After her mother's death and father's ensuing depression, 13-year-old Sasha decides to look on the bright side of life and become a stand-up comedian.

title: Comedy Warriors: Healing Through Humor
cast: Robert Henline, Rob Jones, Joe Kashnow, Stephen Rice, Darisse Smith
summary: Take five wounded veterans and four top comedians, the result... laughter and the healing power of humor.

title: The Comedy of Terrors
cast: Vincent Price, Peter Lorre, Boris Karloff, Joyce Jameson, Joe E. Brown
summary: Dishonest undertaker Waldo Trumbull and his sidekick Felix Gillie are creating their own customers when they cannot find willing ones.
